mapper.insert: insert into base_card(id, hosp_code, profile_id, card_no, card_password, card_type_code, status_code, account_balance, settle_id, ele_health_id, city_health_id, def_card_type, def_card_no, health_code_text, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time) values (#{id}, #{hospCode}, #{profileId}, #{cardNo}, #{cardPassword}, #{cardTypeCode}, #{statusCode}, #{accountBalance}, #{settleId}, #{eleHealthId}, #{cityHealthId}, #{defCardType}, #{defCardNo}, #{healthCodeText}, #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime})
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id as profile_id, a.name, a.age, a.gender_code, a.phone, a.cert_code, a.cert_no, a.out_profile, a.in_profile, b.id, b.card_type_code, b.card_no, b.status_code, b.account_balance FROM base_profile_file a LEFT JOIN base_card b on a.id = b.profile_id AND a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and is_valid = '1'
and (a.name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or a.cert_no like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or a.out_profile like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or a.in_profile like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or a.phone like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
and a.crte_time >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and a.crte_time < DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 1 day)
and b.status_code = #{statusCode}
ORDER BY a.crte_time desc

select (select name from base_profile_file b where profile_id = b.id and b.hosp_code = hosp_code) as name, card_no, status_code, card_type_code, crte_time, crte_name from base_card where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and profile_id = #{profileId}
mapper.insert: insert into base_card_change (id, hosp_code, profile_id, card_id, status_code, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time) values (#{id}, #{hospCode}, #{profileId}, #{cardId}, #{statusCode}, #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime})
